description: This dataset identifies the percentage of Rochester-Genesee Regional Transportation Authority (RGRTA) buses that are on time. On-time performance includes the percentage of buses that leave their start point or arrive at a destination within 2:59 minutes early to 5:59 minutes late.

metadata.description: This dataset includes ridership for the eight transportation subsidiaries managed by the Rochester Genesee Regional Transportation Authority. Ridership includes the total number of riders, passengers or boardings.

name: Rochester-Genesee Regional Transportation Authority (RGRTA) Rider Volumes:  Beginning 2006
